topic.title: Setting File Management Preferences
topic.p: The File Management Preferences window enables you to set the start path when you view the File Management window, and enables you to show or hide hidden files.

ol.title: To Set Your File Management Preferences:
ol.li: On the control panel, click File Management in the My Preferences menu.
Type the start path you want in the Start Path field.
Select the Show Hidden Files option you want. Select Yes to have hidden files shown by default. Select No to not show hidden files by default.
Click Save. Your File Management Preferences have been set.
